articles.description: The actor, 31, now leads the bookies favourites to take on the role, it was revealed on Tuesday, while fans have also thrown their support behind him.
articles.content:
Regé-Jean Page has hinted that he could be a good contender to succeed Daniel Craig as James Bond.

articles.title: Cardi B jokingly tells Vince McMahon to 'count your f***** days' after getting namedropped on Raw - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 28-year-old star - who used to be a big wrestling fan - was left baffled after fans started tagging her in posts during Monday night's show, before realizing that Torrie Wilson had referred to her.
articles.content:

articles.title: Bond girl Tanya Roberts DIES day after premature death announcement - Daily Mail
articles.description: Actress, left and right, died Monday night at L.A.'s Cedars-Sinai Hospital, her partner said. Lance O'Brien, inset, and rep Mike Pingel said she had died Sunday before correcting their mistake.
articles.content:
Tanya Roberts has died just 24 hours after her partner and rep prematurely said she passed away. She is pictured in 2017
